Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits foreign agents from holding public office and political party positions
Summary: Prohibits persons who are or have ever been foreign agents from holding public office and political party positions; defines "foreign agent".
LawCode: Amd §3, Pub Off L; add §2-126, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the election law, in relation to prohibiting foreign agents from holding public office and political party positions
